title: An English county: Surrey
creator_credit: Frank Gardner and Central Office of Information
brief_description: A portrait of Surrey, showing towns, villages, hills and riversides, recalling places of historical association and familirar beauty spots, and revealing some lesser-known features of the county. Includes scenes of Box Hill, Leith Hill, Friday Street, Shere and Abinger Hammer.
